title: Manicules on Flickr
content:
I’ve started a new group on Flickr for photos of manicules (aka printer’s fists, indexes, pointers, hands, digits, etc):  
 [http://www.flickr.com/groups/manicule/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123032746/http:/www.flickr.com/groups/manicule/ "http://www.flickr.com/groups/manicule/")

Many of the submissions extend beyond the confines of typography, even into the third dimension, but I figured it might be of interest nonetheless.

For those of you with Flickr accounts, please feel free to add any images you might have!

 [‹ Typetools (hot or not)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123032746/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40298 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font Poll ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123032746/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39797 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Nick Sherman
